entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:20 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:20 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
